timeline.message: Reorder repositories by cost and popularity

Fix #2919 Fix #2797 Fix #981 Fix #878 Fix #502 Perforce refactoring

- Run a p4-changes and p4-filelog, and integrate
  the results, so only two p4 commands are needed
  for History for a directory tree.
- Parse file names from p4 commands so that
  HistoryEntry instances have defined files.
- Recognize binary file log for annotations.

Avoid IllegalArgumentException, and log condition

Accommodate a repository that can transiently
return errors, such as Perforce when a login
expires.

timeline.body: I assume this needs some setup steps to populate the root somehow. Could you perhaps update the test case with the steps ?
